altTitles.en: The Killer Who Loves You

description.en:
Suzuki Ryuuto is an introverted, timid college student. Every day he puts on a fake smile, trying his best to blend into a group of outgoing students even despite cruel teasing about his virginity.  
  
But one day, he comes to a drinking party where he meets a beautiful girl, Kokoa. Per her request, he starts to pretend to be her boyfriend to ward off the stalker who is harassing Kokoa.  
  
That tender love was the beginning of a tragedy…

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Part 3

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!

altTitles.en: The Essence of Reincarnation
Standard of Reincarnation

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

altTitles.en: A Sign of Affection
Attached to Your Fingertips

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักจากหัวใจ

altTitles.en: Love Affection

description.de: Als die gehörlose Studentin Yuki eines Tages in Schwierigkeiten gerät, kommt ihr ihr Kommilitone Itsuomi zu Hilfe. Yuki ist fasziniert von Itsuomi, da er sie trotz ihres Handicaps wie einen ganz normalen Menschen behandelt. Durch ihn beginnt Yuki nicht nur eine neue Welt zu entdecken, sondern bekommt auch zum ersten Mal Herzklopfen.
description.en:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
description.es: La vida de Yuki, una universitaria con sordera, va a dar un vuelco cuando en su camino se cruce el joven Itsuomi, un muchacho que, a pesar de dominar varios idiomas, no conoce la lengua de signos japonesa. Itsuomi se interesa enseguida en Yuki y desea aprender la lengua de signos y, sobre todo, entrar en el mundo de ella. Signos de afecto es una historia de amor sobre la necesidad de la comunicación, sobre el aprendizaje de las diferencias y sobre la empatía.
description.fr:
Yuki est une étudiante qui, comme beaucoup d'autres, construit son quotidien autour de ses amis, des réseaux sociaux et de ce qu'elle aime. Mais quand un jour, dans le train, elle croise un jeune homme qui voyage à travers le monde, son univers va être chamboulé: ce dernier, bien que trilingue, ne connaît pas la langue des signes. Pourtant, très vite, il manifestera pour elle un intérêt bien particulier… Comment réagira-t-elle face à ce camarade d'université entreprenant et communicatif?

A sign of affection décrit avec pudeur et simplicité l'histoire d'amour entre une jeune femme sourde et un grand voyageur. à n'en pas douter, les personnages de ce manga ne manqueront pas de vous émouvoir!
description.it: Un giorno, in un momento di difficoltà, una studentessa universitaria di nome Yuki viene aiutata da Itsuomi, un senpai che frequenta il suo stesso istituto. Il giovane la tratta con grande naturalezza e non si scompone minimamente quando capisce che la ragazza è sorda. Ben presto, Yuki scoprirà di provare qualcosa per quel ragazzo, grazie al quale ha cominciato a percepire la realtà in maniera del tutto nuova...
description.ja: 女子大生の雪は、ある日困っているところを同じ大学の先輩・逸臣に助けてもらう。聴覚障がいがあって耳が聴こえない雪にも動じることなく、自然に接してくれる逸臣。自分に新しい世界を感じさせてくれる逸臣のことを雪は次第に意識し始めて…！？
description.ko: 여대생 유키는 어느날 곤란에 처해있을 때 같은 대학 선배인 이츠오미의 도움을 받는다. 청각장애가 있어 귀가 들리지 않는 유키에게도 동요하지 않고 자연스럽게 대해주는 이츠오미. 자신에게 새로운 세계를 느끼게 해준 이츠오미를 유키는 점점 의식하기 시작하는데…?!
description.pt: Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda. Ela ama estar perto dos seus amigos, redes sociais e fazer compras. Certo dia, ela recebe ajuda de Itsuomi, um estudante da mesma universidade que ela, enquanto estava no metrô. A partir daí, nasce uma amizade entre eles que se torna cada vez mais especial. "Neste dia, Yuki sentiu o seu mundo mudar."
description.ru: Это нежная история о любви между глухонемой девушкой и парнем, говорящем на нескольких языках и облетевшем мир, как много они могут привнести и изменить в мирах друг друга? Ицуоми выручает Юки, оказывается, что они учатся в одном университете. Случайная встреча, заинтересованность, стремление, желание… Что же Юки постепенно осознает?..
description.th: วันหนึ่ง ขณะกำลังตกที่นั่งลำบาก ยูคิ นักศึกษาสาว ได้อิสึโอมิ รุ่นพี่นักศึกษามหา'ลัยเดียวกันช่วยไว้แม้ยูคิจะไม่ได้ยินเสียงเพราะมีความบกพร่องทางการได้ยินแต่อิสึมิก็ยังทำตัวปกติเป็นธรรมชาติกับเธออย่างใจเย็นจากนั้นยูคิก็เริ่มสนใจอิสึมิที่ช่วยตัวเองได้สัมผัสถึงโลกใบใหม่ขึ้นมา...!?
description.tr: Tüm dünyası arkadaşları, sosyal medyası ve çok satanları etrafında dönen Yuki, tipik bir üniversite öğrencisidir. Ancak bir trende, bir arkadaşının arkadaşı olan İtsuomi-san ile tanışma şansı olunca dünyası genişlemeye başlar. Fakat maalesef, her ne kadar İtsuomi-kun üç dil konuşabilse de, işaret dili onlardan biri değildir. İkisi, aralarındaki tomurcuklanan duyguları birbirine iletmeyi öğrenebilecek mi?
description.uk:
Юкі — студентка. Як і в багатьох інших ровесників, її повсякденне життя обертається навколо друзів, соцмереж, загалом усього, що їй подобається. Та якось вона випадково зустріла в потязі юнака, що любить подорожувати, і її світ перевернувся.

Іцуомі трилінгв, однак не знає японської мови жестів.

Проте незабаром він нею особливо зацікавиться… Як Юкі відреагує на цього впертого однокурсника, який прагне подружитися з нею? «A Sign of affection» лаконічно і просто описує історію кохання дівчини з порушенням слуху та завзятого мандрівника. Без сумніву, стосунки між героями цієї манґи неодмінно вас зворушать!
description.zh: 自從與你相遇之后，我的世界出現了改變的聲音。
description.pt-br:
Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda, cujo mundo gira em torno de seus amigos, redes sociais e as últimas vendas. Mas quando um encontro casual em um trem a leva a conhecer o amigo de um amigo e colega estudante Itsuomi-san, seu mundo começa a se ampliar. Mas mesmo que Itsuomi-kun fale três línguas, a linguagem de sinais não é uma delas.  

Os dois podem aprender a comunicar os sentimentos que estão surgindo entre eles?

altTitles.zh-ro: OL Vtuber yǔ tā tuī de JK

altTitles.en: OL Vtuber and Oshi JK-chan
Office Lady Vtuber and Her Fave High Schooler-chan

description.en:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.
description.ja:
普通の会社員、熊谷雛乃【くまがい ひなの】26歳のストレス発散は、お風呂とお酒と...Vtuber！　ゲーム実況の配信なんかをやっているのだ。
そんな彼女の推しVは、江守亜都【えもり あと】。魅惑のセクシーボイスでとろかす色っぽいキャラ！

ひょんなことから、推しとコラボすることになった雛乃。待ち合わせ場所に向かうとそこに待っていたのは......!?

お疲れ気味OL Vtuberと、ワケあり風味なJKおねーさんのとびきり蕩けるコラボが描く、尊しストーリー♪

title.en: Boku no Kawaii Musume wa Futago no Kenja

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者 ～特技がデバフの底辺黒魔導士、育てた双子の娘がSランクの大賢者になってしまう～

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no kawai musume wa futago no kenja: tokugi ga debafu no teihen kuro madoushi, sodateta futago no musume ga S-rank no dai kenja ni natte shimau

altTitles.en: My Lovely Daughters Are Both Sages: I’m a Black Mage Whose Special Skill Is Debuffing, and the Twin Daughters I Raised Become S-Ranked Great Sages!

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者

description.en:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents. 

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!" 

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician’s academy. 

After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news… They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?! 

A new adventure between a father and his daughters begin!

One day, the lone workaholic Liu Yixia was declared to have abnormal blood stem cells from within and now suffer from acute lymphocytic leukemia. Her life takes a drastic turn and the usual independent Yixia has to now turn to her family for help. In the process of chemotherapy as if fighting a tug-of-war with death, would she truly be able to accept her family's love and care for her?

If I found you within 100,000 people, would I shake hands with a lonely life?

Family, strangers, and blood related relationships.
Taiwan's first blood stem cell topic comic. 

[Initiated by the Kaohsiung Northwest Rotary Club and hosted by Assistance Professor Luo Helin of Tainan National University of the Arts of the project "In Comparison with Us - Blood Stem Cell Database Creation Project", they invited the Gold Comic Award winner Monday Recover and popular author Wu Xiaole to collaborate on the comic strip "Have I found you?". They hope to promote the concept of blood stem cell creation through the form of comics to help more blood cancer patients.]

description.en: Comedy + Transmigration System. My name is Xia Chi. I originally thought that the four female masters would act as my bodyguards on the path to becoming a god, but little did I know, each of them has their own ulterior motives. They actually want me to be their little cotton-padded jacket!?
description.zh: 搞笑+系统穿越。我叫夏迟,原以为四位女师父作为保 镖护我一路封神成为圣子,没想到她们各怀鬼胎,竟想 让我当她们的小棉袄!?

description.en:
The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898)

altTitles.en: You’re So Cute What Should I Do
You are so cute

description.en:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.zh: 女儿的超能力是把我变帅！

description.en: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...

title.en: Motokano Sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Hagukumitai.

altTitles.ja: 元カノ先生は、ちょっぴりエッチな家庭訪問できみとの愛を育みたい。

altTitles.en: Ex-girlfriend Teachers Want to Nurture Love by Making Slightly Naughty Visits to Your Home

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kano-sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Haguku Mitai.

description.en: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！
description.es-la: Las nuevas profesoras del estudiante Touma Nijino son sus ex novias que le dejaron en el pasado. Además, tanto Akamine Shuri como Shirasawa Kohaku siguen enamoradas de él. Se alegra de volver a verlas, pero.... No se alegra de volver a verlas... "Oye, ¿puedo besarte?" "¿Odias acostarte conmigo?" Empiezan a competir entre ellas al mismo tiempo, tratando de concretar un hecho ya establecido con Tohru antes de la graduación. Además, viven en el mismo complejo de apartamentos que Tohru e intentan alimentar su amor en secreto como una "esposa viajera"...? ¡Esta es una dulce comedia de amor con ex-novias profesoras que te tientan con todo lo que tienen!

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

altTitles.ja: 今日もハジメ先輩が好きすぎる

description.en: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Cute Baby Is Coming: Daddy and Mommy Are Super Fierce

My Baby Is My Talent Agent

description.en: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning, her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However, her date turns out to be Mark Quinn, the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...

Shizuka Kamishiro is 21 years old, with no money, no friends, and no girlfriend. He was stuck at home, after he got scammed by a college acquaintance who wasn't even really a friend, when he heard a loud gasp from his neighbor, a college girl who was fucking her boyfriend while he's lying on his mattress suffering all alone. The absurd difference in circumstances drove him crazy, and he punched the wall so hard that he broke through. The neighbors came over, and her boyfriend beat him almost senseless. As despair and dark emotions overwhelmed him, a messenger from the demon world appeared. Immediately, the boyfriend's head flew off, and the demon told him, "So, go ahead and XXX this girl."

When a young man gains supernatural powers, an immoral "erotic x grotesque" game begins!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
description.ja:
金なし、彼女なし、友達なしの苦学生・神城静21歳。



同じ大学で友達とも呼べない知り合いに勧められた投資詐欺に引っかかり、自宅で意気消沈していると、隣人の女子大生の大きな喘ぎ声が聞こえてくる。



布団にくるまり苦しむ自分と、彼氏とハッスルしている女子大生。そのあまりに理不尽な違いに思わず発狂し、勢いそのままに壁パンをかましたところ壁が貫通。すると、女子大生とその彼氏が乗り込んできて半殺しにされる。



絶望を通り越し、暗黒の感情が充満したその時、目の前に魔界からの使者が現れる。一瞬にして、彼氏の首が飛び、そして使者はこう告げるーー。


「その女、×××しなよ」超絶画力で紡ぐ“エロ×グロ“の男子校ノリ全開の不謹慎エンターテインメント！

altTitles.en: One Plus One
Pregnant Wife

description.en:
He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold, fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.  
  
The first time they met, he asked, “Was it you, six years ago?”  
  
The second time they met, he’s holding onto the DNA test, “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”  
  
The n time they met, “Mr. Duke, do you have an end to this?”  
The guy smiled with a deep charm, “The second child have yet to be born. Of course, there’s no end to this.”

altTitles.en: The Climber

description.en: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
description.ru:
В старшей школе Северной Ёкосуки новый, необычный ученик – Мори Бунтаро. В первый же день он отдает предпочтение крыше здания, чем ее кабинетам, где со всех сторон сыплются расспросы. Чтобы отвязаться от надоедливых одноклассников, лихо спрыгивающих с карниза вниз по веревке, Мори совершает безумный поступок: без страховки забирается на крышу по трубе, да еще в таком месте, где это достаточно проблематично, даже для тренированного человека! Одноклассник Миямото и Ониси-сенсей в ужасе и восторге, ведь они профессиональные скалолазы, а тут появляется такой способный ученик! Но Мори не разделяет их восторга и не принимает помощи. Нелюдимый и гордый, он всего добивается в одиночку, и трудности скалолазания его не пугают. Он собирается покорять вершину за вершиной, с каждый разом поднимаясь все выше.   
  
Note: Sakamoto Shinichi did both the story and the art from Volume 4 onwards.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Delcourt](https://www.editions-delcourt.fr/mangas/series/serie-ascension)

altTitles.en: Spica of Sin and Punishment

description.en:
Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Sumika Tomugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tomugi by chance. 

Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tomugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." 

Teacher and student… two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de classe por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

description.en: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack of All Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack of All Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
description.ja:
「器用貧乏」は罪なのか！？
ソツなくガンバってきたのに戦力外通告！！

勇者パーティに所属しているオルンは、ある日突然
パーティリーダーから告げられる。

「実力不足だからパーティを抜けろ」

と。

さらに、他の仲間からは「器用貧乏」と罵られるオルン。
確かに、全てが平均的で突出した能力はない。
だが、ソツなく器用にこなしていたし、何より皆には
一番尽くしていたはずなのに…！？

失意のオルンは、ソロでの活動を開始する。
しかしその胸には、究極の「器用貧乏」ーー “万能者”になる野心が秘められていた。

description.en: Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class. He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
description.ja: クラスでは目立たない地味な女子高生の三蔵五葉。そんな彼女が無人の屋上で、制服の下に隠していたエロボディをさらけ出している姿を目撃してしまった阿下喜鏡介。こうして奇しくもエロすぎる肉体のヒミツを共有することになった二人が交わした約束とはいったい!?

«Мен сыныптасыма ғашық болып қалдым». 
«Мен бір қызға қызығушылық таныта бастадым».

description.uk:
«Нещодавно мені дехто сподобався. Він мій однокласник».
Мила історія про двох, таємно закоханих одне в одного, студентів!
description.vi:
Thời học sinh bạn đã bao giờ crush ai chưa?
Cậu bạn cùng bàn?
Lớp trưởng học giỏi?
Hay một anh khóa trên điến trai?

Chắc hắn rất nhiều người trong chúng ta đều từng có một thời thầm thương trộm nhớ ai đó. Giống như cô bạn nhỏ nhắn Bách Linh và cậu hot boy An Dư Triết thầm thích nhau mà không hay vậy.

"Yêu thâm" là câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn với những ngại ngùng, quan tâm vô tình và ghen tuông nho nhỏ, khiến màu sắc cuộc sống của đôi bạn trẻ trở nên tươi đẹp và muôn màu hơn. Đồng thời bộ truyện cũng giúp người đọc trải nghiệm những cung bậc cảm xúc ngọt ngào, lãng mạn, đôi khi trầm lắng nhưng lại ngây ngô ngốc nghếch của cả hai.
description.pt-br:
Recentemente comecei a gostar de alguém. Ele é meu colega de classe.”
Os instantâneos curtos e doces de um romance florescente entre dois estudantes desavisados! Embalado com interações fofas entre personagens adoráveis ​​(para não mencionar bonitos!), esta série certamente satisfará seu desejo por doces

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

altTitles.en: I Want to Die Alone

description.en: A hardworking career woman who never married died alone, found in a miserable state. Her niece, Yamaguchi Narumi (35 and single), who was hit hard by the news shifted from looking for marriage to preparing for her death. She decided that the only way to die alone without bothering anyone and die better is to live the same way. This is the birth of a definitive beautiful human life story about facing love and death in earnest.

altTitles.en: Heeran Love Song
Heeran's National Sonata

description.en: A hidden love story of a ghost princess who never loved anyone. General Jahyeon of Heeran Nation marries Soru, a ‘princess who sees ghosts’ by the king’s order. Jahyeon is cold to Soru, but he has the power to ward off ghosts, hence Soru wants to stay by his side. Soru is willing to sacrifice everything for Jahyeon, who is her only safe haven. Jahyeon is getting more and more concerned about Soru, but…
description.uk: Таємнича історія кохання принцеси-привида, яка ніколи нікого не любила. Генерал Джа Хьон з нації Хіран одружується із Со Ру, «принцесою, яка бачить привидів», за наказом короля. Джа Хьон холодно ставиться до Со Ру, але якимсь чином він відлякує привидів, тому вона хоче залишитися з ним. Со Ру готова пожертвувати всім заради Джа Хьона, який здатен дати їй відчуття безпеки. Він дедалі більше непокоїться за принцесу, але...

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

title.ja: Chotto Dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai Kara Oikakete Kita

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

altTitles.en: A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!

description.en:
Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world.

One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world !! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata !! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused !! (in many ways).

Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?) !! A sweet and thick romantic comedy woven around the dark elf beauty's slightly heavy schizophrenic love !!!

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
description.id: Hinata, seorang siswa SMA yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain dan menjadi pahlawan dengan kekuatan Dewa. Mengalahkan Raja Iblis bersama Mariabel "Dark Elf", dan bersama teman-temannya. Penuhi keinginan Dewa dengan aman dan kembali ke dunia ini lagi. Satu bulan setelah itu, Hinata kembali ke dunianya, tetapi Mariabel juga datang ke sini dari dunia lain!! Alasan dia datang ke sini adalah untuk mengikuti Hinata yang dicintainya!! Dan hanya untuknya, Dia menyerang Hinata setiap kali dia menolaknya. cinta yang berat dan satu sendok teh kecemburuan!! (dalam banyak hal). Bisakah Hinata, yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup dengan Dark Elf, hidup dengan aman (?)!! Sebuah komedi romantis manis dan gravitasi yang menjalin dengan kecantikan Echizosic Dark Elf yang agak berat!!! (Manga ini terinpirasi dari manga H)

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

description.en:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters…  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---
description.fr:
Un jour d'école normal, Tsukuru et ses camarades de classe sont transportés dans un autre monde.  
  
Ils se retrouvent… au beau milieu d’une vente aux enchères! Alors que ses camarades de classe, encore confus, sont rapidement mis aux enchères, Tsukuru découvre qu"il possède la classe "cuisinier." Aucune nation ne faisant d’offres, il est rapidement jeté dehors par une porte de transfert.  
  
De l'autre côté de cette porte se trouve un territoire dominé par de puissants monstres…  
  
Alors qu'il réussit tout juste à survivre aux attaques d’un monstre, Tsukuru décide d'avancer sur le chemin qui le rendra plus fort!

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

description.en:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her.

Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! 

As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth’s science as well as her newfound powers! 

Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

description.en: Born as the Thirteenth Prince, Noah was originally in a position removed from the imperial succession, so he freely passed his time in the fief granted to him. However, the Crown Prince died before the Emperor. The imperial succession would be fairly contested among the remaining princes. Noah, being the strongest despite living freely, overwhelmed the other princes and eventually became the Emperor with the most power in the world.
description.pt-br: Nascido como o 13º Príncipe, Noah estava originalmente em uma posição afastada da sucessão imperial, então ele passou livremente seu tempo no feudo que lhe foi concedido. No entanto, o príncipe herdeiro morreu antes do imperador. A sucessão imperial seria bastante contestada entre os príncipes restantes. Noah, sendo o mais forte apesar de viver livremente, oprimiu os outros príncipes e acabou se tornando o imperador com mais poder do mundo.

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.en: They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
